thread.title: BRIEF-Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 45 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 45 pct

organizations.name: ningbo shuanglin auto parts co ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to decrease by 30 percent to 45 percent, or to be 179.7 million yuan to 228.7 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 326.8 million yuan
* Comments that increased price of rolled steel and costs of units as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Wcsd2q
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
